ygData.subject: Re:   Babbling
ygData.msgSnippet: Instrat went from a smile to an expression of horror and sadness. Instrat: May Carnage rot in hell if he s going to be that way. I bid you farewell, Teltoli.

Instrat went from a smile to an expression of horror and sadness.

Instrat: May Carnage rot in hell if he's going to be that way. I bid you
farewell, Teltoli.

Instrat walked away, and when she was sure they couldn't se, she cried...

----- Original Message -----
From: <steph_teltoli@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, January 09, 2001 12:46 AM
Subject: Babbling


> Teltoli raised an eyebrow, and a 'oh!' looked crossed her face. "No,
> don't say I'm a good fighter, and.. oh for crying out loud.. don't
> saulte me. I appreciate the offer and all, but I've already got a
> travelling companion, and I don't need to be protected!"
>
> She waved her hands about wildly, speaking fast, as if to emphasize
> her point.
>
> "And you know, I really don't think Carnage likes you, not that I
> don't like you, I think you could be a really good friend, but if we
> all travelled together I think it would create problems. Like last
> time, this other raptor called Rage, or something, joined us and that
> caused major problems, you know. And I really don't want that to
> happen, because I wanna be friends with Carnage.. but I do think we
> could be friends! You just.. can't.. come along with us, because of
> all the.."
>
> She stopped, and looked at Carnage. "You're supposed to stop me when
> I do that" She half-frowned.
>
> "I'm sorry, Instrat, but.. I can't. I'm really sorry. You can find
> other friends, better friends than I ever could be!" She smiled, a
> pale imatation of her usual one, and cast a regretful look at the
> female bot, and then started walking after Carnage.
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "SOULSTICE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> > Instrat walked afteer Carnage.
> >
> > Instrat: I'm aware I make mistakes, but you should not be saying
> stuff like
> > that to a friend. You're pathetic. Teltoli, you are a good fighter,
> I salute
> > you. I wish to follow along with you, Teltoli, protect you from
> Carnage, be
> > your traveling partner. Your so called friend thinks she can
> intimidate me,
> > but I shall not do anything to harm her. I swear.
> >
> > Instrat smiled to Teltoli and stayed by her side. (Spooky enough?
> > )
>
>
>
>
